page.title: 16Keirsbeath opencast mining
page.content: On the outskirts of Hill of Beath there is an opencast mining works owned by French Keir.They scrape off the top soil off the ground then they dig down with an excavator till they hit a coal seam.If they hit hard rock they will use high explosives to blast the rock away.All the earth they dig up is piled up to make a kind of hill so the dust does not blow onto the houses surrounding the opencast.Lots of people including my family complain about how much explosive is used because of the dust and noise.Tractor Shovels Company have been working on the opencast since 1984.The opencast recently hit a coal seam in June 1985.When they have finished, the area will be made into a park.
